chapter.name: I bob: Natural sonlarni qo'shish va ayirish

topic.title: Natural sonlar
topic.name: Natural sonlar va nol haqida tushuncha

question.question_text: What is the sum of $5$ and $0$?
question.solution: Adding $0$ to any natural number does not change its value, so $5 + 0 = 5$.

chapter.name: I bob: Natural sonlarni qo'shish va ayirish

topic.title: Natural sonlar
topic.name: Natural sonlar va nol haqida tushuncha

question.question_text: What is the result of $0 + 12$?
question.solution: Adding $0$ to $12$ keeps the value unchanged, so $0 + 12 = 12$.

chapter.name: I bob: Natural sonlarni qo'shish va ayirish

topic.title: Natural sonlar
topic.name: Natural sonlar va nol haqida tushuncha

question.question_text: If $x + 0 = x$ and $x$ is a natural number, which of the following equations is true?
question.solution: For any natural number $x$, adding $0$ does not change its value. Thus, $7 + 0 = 7$.

chapter.name: I bob: Natural sonlarni qo'shish va ayirish

topic.title: Natural sonlar
topic.name: Natural sonlar va nol haqida tushuncha

question.question_text: Quyidagi sonlardan qaysi biri natural son emas? \( \text{A) } 0 \text{ B) } 3 \text{ C) } 1 \text{ D) } 7 \)
question.solution: 0 natural son hisoblanmaydi, chunki natural sonlar 1 dan boshlanadi.

chapter.name: I bob: Natural sonlarni qo'shish va ayirish

topic.title: Natural sonlar
topic.name: Natural sonlar va nol haqida tushuncha

question.question_text: Sonlar qatorida 1 dan keyingi sonni toping. \( \text{A) } 2 \text{ B) } 3 \text{ C) } 0 \text{ D) } 1 \)
question.solution: Natural sonlar qatori ketma-ketlikda 1, 2, 3 va hokazo bo'ladi.

chapter.name: I bob: Natural sonlarni qo'shish va ayirish

topic.title: Natural sonlar
topic.name: Natural sonlar va nol haqida tushuncha

question.question_text: Quyidagi sonlardan qaysi biri natural son emas? \( \text{A) } 0 \text{ B) } 3 \text{ C) } 1 \text{ D) } 7 \)
question.solution: 0 natural son hisoblanmaydi, chunki natural sonlar 1 dan boshlanadi.

chapter.name: I bob: Natural sonlarni qo'shish va ayirish

topic.title: Natural sonlar
topic.name: Natural sonlar va nol haqida tushuncha

question.question_text: Natural sonlarning eng kichik qiymatini yozing.
question.solution: Natural sonlar qatorining eng kichik qiymati 1 ga teng.

chapter.name: I bob: Natural sonlarni qo'shish va ayirish

topic.title: Natural sonlar
topic.name: Natural sonlar va nol haqida tushuncha

question.question_text: Sonlar qatorida 1 dan keyingi sonni toping. \( \text{A) } 2 \text{ B) } 3 \text{ C) } 0 \text{ D) } 1 \)
question.solution: Natural sonlar qatori ketma-ketlikda 1, 2, 3 va hokazo bo'ladi.

chapter.name: I bob: Natural sonlarni qo'shish va ayirish

topic.title: Natural sonlar
topic.name: Natural sonlar va nol haqida tushuncha

question.question_text: Natural sonlar qatori cheksizmi yoki chekli?
question.solution: Natural sonlar qatori cheksiz davom etadi.

chapter.name: I bob: Natural sonlarni qo'shish va ayirish

topic.title: Natural sonlar
topic.name: Natural sonlar va nol haqida tushuncha

question.question_text: Natural sonlar qanday raqamlardan tashkil topadi? \( \text{A) } 1 \text{dan 9 gacha} \text{ B) } 0 \text{dan 9 gacha} \text{ C) } 1 \text{dan 0 gacha} \text{ D) } 1 \text{dan cheksizgacha} \)
question.solution: Natural sonlar qatori 1 dan boshlanib cheksiz davom etadi.

chapter.name: I bob: Natural sonlarni qo'shish va ayirish

topic.title: Natural sonlar
topic.name: Natural sonlar va nol haqida tushuncha

question.question_text: Natural sonlarning cheksizligini qanday isbotlash mumkin?
answer: Har bir natural sondan keyingi sonni topish mumkinligi sababli, ular cheksizdir.
question.solution: Natural sonlar cheksiz davom etadi, chunki har bir sonni 1 ga oshirib yangi son hosil qilinadi.

chapter.name: I bob: Natural sonlarni qo'shish va ayirish

topic.title: Natural sonlar
topic.name: Natural sonlar va nol haqida tushuncha

question.question_text: Natural sonlar o'rtasida qaysi amal doimo natural son hosil qiladi? \( \text{A) } Qo'shish \text{ B) } Ayirish \text{ C) } Ko'paytirish \text{ D) } Bo'lish \)
question.solution: Natural sonlarning qo'shilishi va ko'paytirilishi natijasi doimo natural son bo'ladi.

chapter.name: I bob: Natural sonlarni qo'shish va ayirish

topic.title: Natural sonlar
topic.name: Natural sonlar va nol haqida tushuncha

question.question_text: Natural sonlar qatori qanday o'nlik sanoq sistemasida tasvirlanadi?
question.solution: Natural sonlar o'nlik sanoq sistemasida 0 dan 9 gacha bo'lgan raqamlardan tuziladi.

chapter.name: I bob: Natural sonlarni qo'shish va ayirish

topic.title: Natural sonlar
topic.name: Natural sonlar va nol haqida tushuncha

question.question_text: Natural sonlardan foydalanib, \(23 + 45\) amalining natijasini toping. \( \text{A) } 58 \text{ B) } 68 \text{ C) } 78 \text{ D) } 88 \)
question.solution: Natural sonlarni qo'shishda \(23 + 45 = 68\).

chapter.name: I bob: Natural sonlarni qo'shish va ayirish

topic.title: Natural sonlar
topic.name: Natural sonlar va nol haqida tushuncha

question.question_text: Natural sonlarning yig'indisini toping: \(1256 + 342 + 789\). \( \text{A) } 2387 \text{ B) } 2397 \text{ C) } 2385 \text{ D) } 2400 \)
question.solution: \(1256 + 342 + 789 = 2387\). Har bir qadamda natural sonlarning ustuncha qo'shilishidan foydalaniladi.

chapter.name: I bob: Natural sonlarni qo'shish va ayirish

topic.title: Natural sonlar
topic.name: Natural sonlar va nol haqida tushuncha

question.question_text: Natural sonlarni ko'paytirish natijasida hosil bo'ladigan eng kichik natija qaysi? \( \text{A) } 1 \text{ B) } 2 \text{ C) } 0 \text{ D) } Cheksiz \)
question.solution: Natural sonlarning ko'paytmasi kamida \(1\) bo'lishi mumkin, chunki nol natural son emas.

chapter.name: I bob: Natural sonlarni qo'shish va ayirish

topic.title: Natural sonlar
topic.name: Natural sonlar va nol haqida tushuncha

question.question_text: Natural sonlar bilan qoldiqli bo'lishni qanday aniqlash mumkin?
answer: Natural sonlarni bir-biriga bo'lganda, qoldiqni topish uchun bo'luvchi va bo'linuvchini aniqlash kerak.
question.solution: Natural sonlar bo'lganda, qoldiqni topish uchun quyidagicha aniqlanadi: \(q = a - b \times n\), bunda \(q\) qoldiq va \(n\) natija.

chapter.name: I bob: Natural sonlarni qo'shish va ayirish

topic.title: Natural sonlar
topic.name: Natural sonlar va nol haqida tushuncha

question.question_text: Natural sonlar qatoridagi 1000-chi element qaysi? \( \text{A) } 999 \text{ B) } 1000 \text{ C) } 1001 \text{ D) } 998 \)
question.solution: Natural sonlar qatorida \(n\)-chi element \(n\) ga teng, shuning uchun 1000-chi element \(1000\) bo'ladi.

chapter.name: I bob: Natural sonlarni qo'shish va ayirish

question.question_text: Qaysi son kattaroq? \( 45 \) va \( 54 \). \( \text{A) } 45 \text{ B) } 54 \text{ C) } Teng \text{ D) } Javob yo'q \)
question.solution: 54 soni 45 dan kattaroq, chunki raqamlar chapdan boshlab taqqoslanganda birinchi katta raqam aniqlanadi.

question.question_text: Qaysi son kichikroq? \( 872 \) va \( 782 \). \( \text{A) } 872 \text{ B) } 782 \text{ C) } Teng \text{ D) } Javob yo'q \)
question.solution: 782 soni kichikroq, chunki 7 < 8 birinchi xonalardan aniqlanadi.

question.question_text: Sonlarni tartiblang: \( 12, 8, 15 \). \( \text{A) } 8, 12, 15 \text{ B) } 15, 12, 8 \text{ C) } 12, 15, 8 \text{ D) } Javob yo'q \)
question.solution: Natural sonlarni o'sish tartibida yozilsa: 8, 12, 15 bo'ladi.

topic.name: Natural sonlarni taqqoslash

question.question_text: Qaysi son bir xil xonali? \( 125 \) va \( 99 \). \( \text{A) } 125 \text{ B) } 99 \text{ C) } Teng \text{ D) } Javob yo'q \)
question.solution: 125 uch xonali, 99 ikki xonali, shuning uchun javob yo'q.

question.question_text: Sonlar qatorida qaysi son birinchi keladi? \( 10 \) va \( 20 \). \( \text{A) } 10 \text{ B) } 20 \text{ C) } Teng \text{ D) } Javob yo'q \)
question.solution: Natural sonlar qatorida kichik son birinchi keladi: \(10\).

question.question_text: Qaysi son kattaroq? \( 234 \) va \( 324 \). \( \text{A) } 234 \text{ B) } 324 \text{ C) } Teng \text{ D) } Javob yo'q \)
question.solution: 324 soni kattaroq, chunki birinchi xonada 3 > 2.

question.question_text: Qaysi son eng kattasi? \( 405, 504, 450 \). \( \text{A) } 405 \text{ B) } 504 \text{ C) } 450 \text{ D) } Javob yo'q \)
question.solution: 504 soni eng kattasi, chunki 5 birinchi xonadagi eng katta raqam.

question.solution: Kamayish tartibi: \(89, 67, 56\).

question.solution: 120 soni 112 dan kattaroq, chunki o'nlik xonasida 2 > 1.

question.question_text: Natural sonlarni taqqoslang: \( 650 \) va \( 605 \). Qaysi biri kattaroq? \( \text{A) } 650 \text{ B) } 605 \text{ C) } Teng \text{ D) } Javob yo'q \)
question.solution: 650 soni kattaroq, chunki yuzlik xonasida 6 = 6, lekin o'nlik xonasida 5 > 0.

question.question_text: Sonlarning yig'indisini taqqoslang: \( (450 + 350) \) va \( (600 + 200) \). \( \text{A) } Birinchi kattaroq \text{ B) } Ikkinchi kattaroq \text{ C) } Teng \text{ D) } Javob yo'q \)
question.solution: 450 + 350 = 800 va 600 + 200 = 800. Natijada ular teng.

question.solution: 902 soni 899 dan kattaroq, chunki yuzlik xonasida 9 > 8.

question.question_text: Sonlarning farqini taqqoslang: \( (745 - 123) \) va \( (650 - 230) \). \( \text{A) } Birinchi kattaroq \text{ B) } Ikkinchi kattaroq \text{ C) } Teng \text{ D) } Javob yo'q \)
question.solution: 745 - 123 = 622 va 650 - 230 = 420. Birinchi farq kattaroq.
